channel.title: 16-player game, no NK
channel.description:
#### What happened? There was no NK in our 16-player game. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? As of the most recent patch, there should have been a NK. #### Steps to reproduce: Queue up for a game and pray to RNGesus #### Comments: I mean, it was still pretty fun to have the world's dumbest Prince and the world's luckiest Sheriff kill the entire Unseen by Day 3, and then watch the BD mislynch and kill each other for the next 7 days before killing the Evil King, but still...
[img]https://i.imgur.com/uL4zqHn.png[/img]

item.title: 16-player game, no NK
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
The thing with our game is the BD killers went on a bit of a rampage and convinced everybody that there was a Reaper

It was really sad to watch, but also kind of funny, I guess

But yep, clearly this is not working as intended.

Read full topic

item.title: 16-player game, no NK
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
Really funny, just had same thing happen. I think we spent like 4 days with no deaths until we realized king had to be evil. The thing is this king played extremely BD friendly lol

item.title: 16-player game, no NK
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
What happened?

There was no NK in our 16-player game.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

As of the most recent patch, there should have been a NK.

Steps to reproduce:

Queue up for a game and pray to RNGesus

Comments:

I mean, it was still pretty fun to have the world’s dumbest Prince and the world’s luckiest Sheriff kill the entire Unseen by Day 3, and then watch the BD mislynch and kill each other for the next 7 days before killing the Evil King, but still…

Read full topic
